channel.title: Could I just add my cache to my client? So people just download it whole?
channel.description: Well title says it all, but to rephrase. What i'm saying is that could I just put in my client cache in the actual client so they don't have to put it in their c:harddrive?

item.title: Could I just add my cache to my client? So people just download it whole?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Yes, you just put it in a folder, and make sure your client reads from that folder, ex:

"./data/cache/";

Instead of whatever you have like:

System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.cache/";

Read full topic
item.source: Could I just add my cache to my client? So people just download it whole?
